Welcome to Brandywine
Academic Services

Brandywine Academic Services provides private tutoring, study skills, SAT Prep and academic coaching to middle and high school students in Wilmington, Northern Delaware, and the surrounding area. Employing only the best certified teachers, students can be confident that they are receiving exceptional help at an affordable price. There are no contracts to sign and no tests to undergo—just give us a call and together we will develop a learning program designed to fit your student’s needs.

Email our founder, Robin Hinmon, to get started: hinmonr@brandywineacademicservices.com

Our Academic Services:

Brandywine Academic Services offers a variety of tutoring programs that can be customized to meet your individual needs. Whether it’s traditional tutoring in one subject, assistance with an upcoming homework assignment, or academic coaching in all of your classes, we can help. Browse Our Academic Services on the left to learn more.

Our Company:

Meet Robin Hinmon
Founder, Brandywine Academic Services

Robin Hinmon graduated from the University of Delaware's Honors Program with a Bachelor's degree in Biology Education and a minor in Mathematics. She holds a Master's degree in Molecular Biology and Biotechnology. Hinmon became a high school teacher to instill her love of learning to her students, but found her most rewarding experiences occurred as she worked part-time as a tutor.

Brandywine Academic Services employs motivating tutors that have a genuine interest in your child's academic success. Each of our tutors has been screened, possesses a minimum of a Bachelor's degree, and has relevant teaching experience. Whether your child is enrolled in a private, small group, or classroom session, our tutors strive to create a personalized learning program that promotes independent thinking and learning.

Email our founder, Robin Hinmon, to get started: hinmonr@brandywineacademicservices.com

Brandywine Academic Services provides private tutoring, study skills, SAT Prep and academic coaching to middle and high school students in Wilmington, Northern Delaware, and the surrounding area.
